title: What Are You Giving Up For Lent?
teaser: From alcohol to Facebook, religious observers are deciding what to give up for the 40-day period before Easter.
contentencoded:
Today is Ash Wednesday, the first day in the Christian season of Lent – the 40 days before Easter. Lent is about a lot of things, but the one everyone talks about is sacrifice: giving up something you really like.

The Rev. James Martin, a Jesuit priest and editor-at-large of America magazine, discusses Lent, why it’s important and what he’s giving up this year, withÂ Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson.

Guest

  • James Martin, Jesuit priest and editor-at-large of America magazine. His latest book is “Jesus: A Pilgrimage.” He tweets @JamesMartinSJ.
